cab.content: (This Telegram is the property of His Britannic Majesty's Government and should be petumed to the Offices of the War Cabinet for transmission to the Colonial Officedone with unless required for official use.)From the Governor General of the Union of South Africato the Secretary of Stats for the Colonies.(Peceived Colonial Office 4.55 p.n.;16th February118).With reference to my. telegram of 5th February wool am now advised number of bales withdrawn is 57,656 leaving 1330X3 in scheme,BUXTON.I
